application_type_full: Householder planning & demolition in a conservation area
description: Demolition and replacement of front boundary wall. Reconfiguration of front garden, including: installation of stair to lightwell, iron railings and gate to front boundary; replacement of lightwell window with French doors; and, excavation below front garden to provide storage space. Reconstruction of side/ rear extension. Replacement/ reconfiguration of windows on front, side and rear elevations. Demolition and relocation of side access steps to allow access to repositioned side door. Removal of 2no. trees. Demolition of non-original rear garden storage extension, rear balcony and garden stairs. Proposed lower ground floor rear extension and terrace with stairs to garden level. Construction of garden shed at rear; and lowering of lower ground floor level. Roof mansard extension with 4no. dormers and 3no. flat rooflights.
